name: Talking Simulator 2021 Ultimate: GOTY Edition
description:
Talking Simulator 2021Ultimate: Game of the Year Edition is here. Experience the phenomenon that Time called "the most greatest piece of art made ever by anybody, hands down, for sure"—now available for free and playable in your browser.

Learn to talk for the first time in this iconic story of love, hope, betrayal, reconciliation, and above all, friendship.

"This game is the game I've been trying to make all along, y'all—quit buying my games and go play this one. I'm cancelling Elden Ring." ~ Hidetaka Miyazaki

"Golly gee whiz, now this is game design!" ~ All the other indie developers

"A piece of art of uncommon profundity, Talking Simulator 2021 Ultimate: GOTY Edition embodies that fearless blend of provocative social commentary, unabashed sex appeal, and multilayered humanism that is so rare in all but the work of the finest of creators." ~ Kirkus Starred Reviews

"A monumental achievement. Brought me to tears." ~ Shigeru Miyamoto

For best results (that is, best performance), download a build and play it locally. Windows builds have not been tested, since I develop on Linux. Let me know if they're less than swagadelic. Also, if there happens to be demand for Mac builds I can add 'em without too much trouble. Just comment on this page.

Seizure warning.

You can find the source code (licensed under AGPL) here.
